N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 636-3.2 - Background and Intent

State Regulations
(a) This Subpart
contains requirements and processes for the provision of residential services
to individuals with intellectual and developmental disabilities in residential
facilities certified or operated by OPWDD (collectively "residential
facilities"). (b) The most
integrated and least restrictive housing options must be explored for all
individuals seeking services in residential facilities. (c) Providers of care management services and

Residential Provider Agencies must partner with OPWDD to facilitate the
provision of residential services to individuals with intellectual and
developmental disabilities, when appropriate. Notes
